name: More Object Info
description: A mod that adds more object properties to the object info text in the level editor.

show-object-id.name: Show Object ID
show-object-id.description: Show the object's ID in the object info text.

show-object-position.name: Show Object Position
show-object-position.description: Show the object's position in the object info text.

show-object-rotation.name: Show Object Rotation
show-object-rotation.description: Show the object's rotation in the object info text.

show-object-scale.name: Show Object Scale
show-object-scale.description: Show the object's scale in the object info text.

show-object-base-color.name: Show Object Base Color
show-object-base-color.description: Show the object's base color in the object info text.

show-object-detail-color.name: Show Object Detail Color
show-object-detail-color.description: Show the object's detail color in the object info text.

show-object-type.name: Show Object Type
show-object-type.description: Show the object's type in the object info text.

show-object-address.name: Show Object Address
show-object-address.description: Show the object's address in the object info text.
